name: ColorDrift (Yoann M., Kevin Roseaux, Fayfay19)
description:
ColorDrift is a local multiplayer car game where competitors have to paint the arena in their own color. The one whose color is the most represented wins. 

This game has been made in less than 3 months by four students from E-artsup Paris in second year.

Drive... Paint... AND WIN !!!
  • Fight up to 4 players in an arena and control the arena.
  • Use your car to paint the ground.
  • Close a paint line to create an explosion.
  • Drift through 4 arenas.
  • Colorful party-game.
Programmers :
  • Aurélien Crouzier
  • Fayçal Khila
Graphists :
  • Yoann Messant
  • Kévin Roseaux
  • All stars Show by Trinity
  • Big Rush by exekat
  • FUEL by Hey Pluto!
  • Metal Gear by Bosnow
  • New Era by Tatami
  • Overdive by Matrika
  • Squad by Infraction

All music and sound effects are royalty free.

  1. Download the .RAR file.
  2. Drag it in any folder you want.
  3. Right Click and click on "Extract Here".
  4. Open the folder called "ColorDrift"
  5. Double click on "ColorDrift.exe"
  6. Congratulations you are ready to play !
